Conversation.line: You'd better be on best behavior, scum.
Good evening, friends!
Those Honkmother lunatics put horns in my goddamn bed. I'm this close to firing the next one I see out of an airlock.
And they say the slave trade is dead. Personally, I think it's just been rebranded.
Shut it, we have visitors.
I miss the trees. I miss the sun, how the air didn't taste like metal.
Some days I lie down and imagine the sky. It's more alien to me than the abominations down here now.
God, do you ever shut up?
Jesus... we weren't meant to be here. The oceans, they're crying.
The abyss whispers to me, and I whisper back. There are far worse creatures down there than Endworms.
Formless, gelatinous creatures with single-minded malevolent will. An entire civilisation of those we thought dead.
They're calling out to me. They want us to join Them. In their city of the dead.
Do they have cookies?
If anyone's skin starts melting, tell me as soon as possible.
I've survived worse.
Wait, what?
It's a joke, lad.
So, what'd you do to end up here?
Talked smack about a Coalition leader.
This place is filthy.
We have bigger concerns than cleanliness. Like Molochs.
Shut your trap.
My safety is of utmost importance!
I'll give you some medical advice for free: get your head out of your ass.
What happens if the hull is breached?
Your body is crushed like a tin can.
Gods preserve us...
There are no gods under the ice. Only us, and the monsters.
My glow-in-the-dark toy won't stop glowing.
